title: CoOOH-catalyzed anodic Oxidation of 5 (Hydroxymethyl)-furfural under non-alkaline Conditions
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00050A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Marten Niklas Gey, Uwe Schröder
The oxidation of 5-(hydroxymethyl)-furfural (HMF), a platform chemical of biogenic origin, to 2,5-furandicarboxylic acid (FDCA) is a reaction of high relevance for a sustainable production of polymers like polyethylene furanoate....
